post.title: Release 0.0.1
post.body:
First release of simple, unstable, basic and unoptimized alternative client for ZeroNet.

* https://github.com/G1itchZero/ZeroGo/releases/v0.0.1
* http://127.0.0.1:43110/g1itch.bit/ZeroGo-win-v0.0.1.exe
* http://127.0.0.1:43110/g1itch.bit/ZeroGo-lin-0.0.1.run (linux version)
